job.title: Lead Software Engineer

segment specific on matters of significance Exercises independent judgment and decision making on complex issues regarding job duties and related tasks and works under minimal supervision Uses cloud focused deliveries They will be responsible for determining the most effective cloud provider for each use case determining the basic patterns and architecture and guiding the development staff in building the solution This person will work directly with IT and BUS leaders to understand use cases and needs as well as the cloud developers and other architects focused primarily on cloud capabilitiesbrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongulli Bachelors degree in Computer Science Information Technology or related fieldlili 3 years experience with cloud technologies Azure Google
